title: Opeth - Live in San Jose 2001 Master DVD
description:
Opeth: Live in San Jose 2001 Master DVD
Venue: Cactus Club, San Jose, CA, USA
May 20, 2001
Lineage: Sony Hi8 Camera, Sony ECM-MS907 Condenser Mic > DVD> DVD Author
Menu, cover and recording by Big Fat OrangeCat (wayshway)


I'm friends with some of the guys in Nevermore and I was filming a bunch of shows for them.
This was the last night of the tour and Martin Lopez asked me to film it for him for his 23rd birthday.
It has really nice picture and sound

Opeth is actually playing on Nevermore's equipment.

I've designed a cover and menu for it.

Set list
01. Happy Birthday
02. White Cluster
03. The Drapery Falls
04. Advent
05. Credence
06. The Leper Affinity
07. Demon of the Fall


MPEG-2 720x480
29.97 fps, 4:3 NTSC
48000 Hz, Stereo
224 kbps

Enjoy
